entities.description: Frequency of feeling hungry as a symptom of cocaine withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Frequency of feeling slowed down or restless as a symptom of cocaine withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Usage of any COCAINE/OTHER drugs to get over or avoid having cocaine withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Usage of cocaine specifically to get over or avoid having cocaine withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent's frequency of feeling hungry as a symptom of cocaine withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Indicates the respondent's frequency of feeling slowed down or restless as a symptom of cocaine withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used any drugs to get over or avoid having cocaine withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used cocaine specifically to get over or avoid having cocaine withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
